name: Get the Game!
description:
While you are watching TV you watch a commercial of the release of the most anticipated game of all time : "Ultra Awesome Game", you have to get it before it sells out, but there is a problem, you are taking care of your granny! How are you going to get the game without leaving your granny alone?... Unless...

Controls:

  • Aim with your mouse to throw yarn balls to the other kids and make them trip so they can't take your precious game copies.

This is our entry for the #ldjam 32.
